item.description:
sports.yahoo.com

Janusz Szymik, 48, was an altar boy when the abuse began in the 1980s. Oh, my God,” Judge William Raines said of attorney Jennifer Bonjean. “... I couldn’t have a visual on that if you paid me.” A link to the video of Tuesday’s livestreamed court call was available for ...

item.description:
finance.yahoo.com

And he has zero confidence Chair Jerome Powell’s Federal Reserve is ready for the battle it now faces.
